mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (password, nickname, age, email, sex) VALUES (#{password},#{nickname},#{age} ,#{email},#{sex})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, password, nickname, age, email,sex, regdate, team_id, session_id, limit_time, profile_image_path, introduce_text FROM user WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT user_id, password, nickname, age, email,sex, regdate, team_id, session_id, limit_time, profile_image_path, introduce_text FROM user WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT user_id, password, nickname,age, email,sex,regdate, team_id, session_id, limit_time, profile_image_path, introduce_text FROM user WHERE team_id = #{teamId}
SELECT user_id, password, nickname,age, email,sex,regdate, team_id, session_id, limit_time, profile_image_path, introduce_text FROM user WHERE session_id = #{sessionId}
